title: Die Leute vom Domplatz
resume:
Die Leute vom Domplatz is a German television series of 1979.The series depicts in a realistic way, the life in a medieval German city of the 13th century.The 13 episodes tell the daily life of the people and the construction of the cathedral.
The DVD Box will be released on amazon Germany on 30.3.2012, German language only.
The title means, "The people from the square at the cathedral"
